name: Dream Detective Demo
description:
Solve the case to win, use the dectective board to line up the clues to the suspects and secure your fate.

Created for Games Studio alongside:

  • Joel - Music, 2D Photobash Artist
  • Tammy - Prop Modelling, Sound Engineer, SFX, UI Designer  - hexosphere
  • Greg - Narrative, Level Design - gsutton111
  • Josh - Environment Artist
  • Jess (me :P) - Programming, Technical Artist, Animator
  • Archie - UX Development and Programming, UI Design
  • Conor -  Character Artist, Environment Design - theConeOar
